title: Signal from your Noisy Neighbor
description: we don't use description, I wonder where this shows up?
background: Have you ever had a noisey neighbor and didnt know what to do? What if that neighbor was a pod in your Kubernetes cluster running thousands of nodes? Well have no fear... Splunk Infrastructure Monitoring is here.
learning_objective: what we want them to learn

phrasings.answer_guidance: "free hint" or how to format, etc
